about_the_game:
“Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks” is a tycoon simulation game that puts you in charge of a small and young arms trading company, specializing in constructing and selling tanks all around the world. Shape the history of tank warfare as you research, design, produce and sell the ultimate fighting machines from the dawn of tank warfare to modern times. Every design decision you make will be tested on the battlefield starting from small skirmishes to world wars. Every business you engage in will affect your company and change the world history. Grow your arms trade empire, monopolize the markets and prove yourself worthy to be called a true Arms Tycoon and Tank Designer!

Roadmap

The items on the Roadmap are the ones closest to the post EA release period and are of course subject to change depending on player feedback, new priorities or unforeseen situations, but we will commit to it as best as we can!

Tank Design

Recreate world-famous tank models or design your own unique fighting vehicles from a multitude of tank components. Adapt your tanks to new challenges and environments with the help of various improvements. Extend the life of your tank models by introducing new powerful upgrade packages and modernisations!

Proving Grounds

Test your designs directly by being in the driver seat of your own tank! Put your vehicle through its paces by navigating obstacles, shooting its armament and controlling it through an entire trial range or simply have fun trying out your steel beasts

Engineering

Fine tune every single tank component with the help of modifications to match upcoming challenges. Acquire your opponent’s tank models and reverse-engineer them to gain access to rare tank components. Use cutting-edge technologies from various tank schools to create decisive instruments of war that the world has never seen!

Tank Schools

Embark on a journey as a renowned worldwide tank designer, selling your cutting-edge tanks to diverse countries. Each nation presents unique tank demands, military doctrines, political systems, and resource accessibility. Guide your company to success through the turbulence of conflicts and world wars!

Company

Control various aspects of your corporation including raw resource procurement, logistics and staff management. Gain access to different corporate advances ranging from building upgrades to new trade deals. Attract and hire tank visionaries to help you lead different parts of your company!

Trade and negotiations

Scout for the most lucrative tank tenders. Grow you companies reputation to gain leverage over your competition. Engage in complex trade negotiations to get the most exclusive deals and become the most powerful company in the world!

Conflicts and World Wars

Observe your tanks performance in all major historical conflicts and world wars. See them succeed or fail and make your design decisions based on the provided battle reports. Make a general-purpose fighting vehicle or adapt your tank models to specific theaters of war!

Current content

ATTT is in Early Access. Here, you can find a list of content that is currently included in the game. This list will of course grow rapidly as we progress along our roadmap and implement more and more features into the game!
detailed_description:
REVIEWS


About the Game

“Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks” is a tycoon simulation game that puts you in charge of a small and young arms trading company, specializing in constructing and selling tanks all around the world. Shape the history of tank warfare as you research, design, produce and sell the ultimate fighting machines from the dawn of tank warfare to modern times. Every design decision you make will be tested on the battlefield starting from small skirmishes to world wars. Every business you engage in will affect your company and change the world history. Grow your arms trade empire, monopolize the markets and prove yourself worthy to be called a true Arms Tycoon and Tank Designer!

Roadmap

The items on the Roadmap are the ones closest to the post EA release period and are of course subject to change depending on player feedback, new priorities or unforeseen situations, but we will commit to it as best as we can!

Tank Design

Recreate world-famous tank models or design your own unique fighting vehicles from a multitude of tank components. Adapt your tanks to new challenges and environments with the help of various improvements. Extend the life of your tank models by introducing new powerful upgrade packages and modernisations!

Test your designs directly by being in the driver seat of your own tank! Put your vehicle through its paces by navigating obstacles, shooting its armament and controlling it through an entire trial range or simply have fun trying out your steel beasts

Engineering

Fine tune every single tank component with the help of modifications to match upcoming challenges. Acquire your opponent’s tank models and reverse-engineer them to gain access to rare tank components. Use cutting-edge technologies from various tank schools to create decisive instruments of war that the world has never seen!

Tank Schools

Embark on a journey as a renowned worldwide tank designer, selling your cutting-edge tanks to diverse countries. Each nation presents unique tank demands, military doctrines, political systems, and resource accessibility. Guide your company to success through the turbulence of conflicts and world wars!

Company

Control various aspects of your corporation including raw resource procurement, logistics and staff management. Gain access to different corporate advances ranging from building upgrades to new trade deals. Attract and hire tank visionaries to help you lead different parts of your company!

Trade and negotiations

Scout for the most lucrative tank tenders. Grow you companies reputation to gain leverage over your competition. Engage in complex trade negotiations to get the most exclusive deals and become the most powerful company in the world!

Conflicts and World Wars

Observe your tanks performance in all major historical conflicts and world wars. See them succeed or fail and make your design decisions based on the provided battle reports. Make a general-purpose fighting vehicle or adapt your tank models to specific theaters of war!

Current content

ATTT is in Early Access. Here, you can find a list of content that is currently included in the game. This list will of course grow rapidly as we progress along our roadmap and implement more and more features into the game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 955 BE
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: intel core i7-4000 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

name: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 955 BE
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 / Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i7-4000 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 5700 dx11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks is a unique combination of tank design and tycoon game. It puts you in charge of an arms trading company specialized in tanks from WWI to the modern era. Research, design, sell and follow your tanks in battle to make your own history!
